name: Calculated Hours for Site Acceptance Test
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PAGA Site Acceptance Test:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(16*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>*0.5)*16) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(PAGA_GES_Location)*>,None))){<* Eval(((1.15*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>)*0.5)*16) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
